Seafire is a powerful and unique ability that Eris possesses. It is a type of elemental magic that allows her to manipulate and control water, turning it into holy blue fire. This ability is quite rare and could make Eris a valuable asset to the empire, especially in a time of war. She could use it to create barriers to protect her allies, launch devastating attacks against enemies, and even control the weather. However, Eris's ability to use Seafire comes with a cost, as it requires a lot of energy and could put her life at risk if she pushes herself too far.

Additionally, this skill also gives her an advantage in the sea, making her a powerful weapon against any naval threats. This skill also gives her an advantage in coastal cities and islands, where the empire might have enemies.

It could also be used as a tool for diplomacy, as the sight of holy blue fire is considered a powerful symbol of protection and hope by the people, Eris could use it as a means of persuasion or to rally support for her cause.
